setting.name: *color
setting.desc: Color of the Race chat box messages.

setting.name: *hurrytime
setting.desc: Display HURRY! message this many seconds before the time runs out.

setting.name: *timeafterfirstfinish
setting.desc: The number of seconds the race continues for after someone wins.

setting.name: *respawntime
setting.desc: Default respawn time in seconds, if one is not set in the map.

setting.name: *duration
setting.desc: Default duration in seconds, if one is not set in the map.

setting.name: *ghostmode
setting.desc: Set to true to disable collisions.

setting.name: *ghostalpha
setting.desc: Set to true to make vehicle semi-transparent when collisions are disabled.

setting.name: *randommaps
setting.desc: Set to true to make the next map selection automatic.

setting.name: #statskey
setting.desc: To identify players for stats.

setting.name: *vehiclecolors
setting.desc: Set to file to use the server file: mods\deathmatch\vehiclecolors.conf

setting.name: *skins
setting.desc: Choose a driver skin. Acceptable values can be 'cj' or 'random' or a range list like this:'7 10 16-20 15'

setting.name: *vehicleweapons
setting.desc: Set to true to allow vehicle weapons.

setting.name: *autopimp
setting.desc: Set to true to apply a selection of visual upgrades to vehicles.

setting.name: *firewater
setting.desc: Set to true to explode the player when entering the water.

setting.name: *cachemodels
setting.desc: Advanced setting to reduce lag-stutter effect. It should usually be enabled here, and disabled in each map that has problems being displayed correctly.

setting.name: *admingroup
setting.desc: To issue certain commands, the player must belong to one of the groups listed.

setting.name: #addons
setting.desc: List of race addon resources to load automatically

setting.name: *blur
setting.desc: Set to 0 to turn off blur.

setting.name: *clouds
setting.desc: Set to false to turn off clouds.

setting.name: *joinspectating
setting.desc: Set to true to make joining players spectate the race in progress.

setting.name: *stealthspectate
setting.desc: Set to true to hide the state of spectating admins.

setting.name: *classicchangez
setting.desc: Set to true to move the player up when changing vehicles.

setting.name: *countdowneffect
setting.desc: Set to true for a fancy effect on the last countdown image.

setting.name: *ghostmode_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *skins_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *vehicleweapons_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *autopimp_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *firewater_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *cachemodels_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *classicchangez_map_can_override
setting.desc: Set to true to allow the map to override this setting

setting.name: *ghostmode_warning_if_map_override
setting.desc: Set to true to issue a warning to players in the chatbox, if the map overrides this setting
